alert.note: Alert for Hyde (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 07 at 11:55AM MDT until further notice by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of central South Dakota, north central South Dakota and northeast South Dakota, including the following counties, in central South Dakota, Hand and Hyde. In north central South Dakota, Faulk. In northeast South Dakota, Spink. * WHEN...Until 1245 AM CDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1253 PM CDT, emergency management reported heavy rain in the warned area due to thunderstorms. Flooding is already occurring, especially in areas that already had high water from the heavy rain on July 5th. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Medicine Creek, Dove Creek, Wolf Creek, Lost Creek, Shaefer Creek, Gooder Creek, Turtle Creek, Silver Creek, Little Turtle Creek, South Fork Medicine Knoll Creek, Matter Creek, Ree Creek, Pearl Creek, Elm Creek, Campbell Creek and Cain Creek. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Miller, St. Lawrence, Zell, Orient, Ree Heights, Burdette, Polo, Vayland and Miller Dale Colony. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
